sn40:1.1.1_0: Ekaṁ samayaṁ āyasmā mahāmoggallāno sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
sn40:1.1.2_0: Tatra kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno bhikkhū āmantesi:
sn40:1.1.4_0: “Āvuso”ti kho te bhikkhū āyasmato mahāmoggallānassa paccassosuṁ.
sn40:1.2.1_0: “Idha mayhaṁ, āvuso, rahogatassa paṭisallīnassa evaṁ cetaso parivitakko udapādi:
sn40:1.2.5_0: ‘idha bhikkhu vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkaṁ savicāraṁ vivekajaṁ pītisukhaṁ paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati.
sn40:1.2.7_1: vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkaṁ savicāraṁ vivekajaṁ pītisukhaṁ paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharāmi.
sn40:1.2.8_0: Tassa mayhaṁ, āvuso, iminā vihārena viharato kāmasahagatā saññāmanasikārā samudācaranti.
sn40:1.3.1_0: Atha kho maṁ, āvuso, bhagavā iddhiyā upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca:
sn40:1.3.4_1: aparena samayena vivicceva kāmehi vivicca akusalehi dhammehi savitakkaṁ savicāraṁ vivekajaṁ pītisukhaṁ paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja vihāsiṁ.
sn40:1.3.5_0: Yañhi taṁ, āvuso, sammā vadamāno vadeyya:
sn40:1.3.6_0: ‘satthārānuggahito sāvako mahābhiññataṁ patto’ti, mamaṁ taṁ sammā vadamāno vadeyya:
sn40:2.1.4_0: ‘idha bhikkhu vitakkavicārānaṁ vūpasamā ajjhattaṁ sampasādanaṁ cetaso ekodibhāvaṁ avitakkaṁ avicāraṁ
sn40:2.1.4_1: samādhijaṁ pītisukhaṁ dutiyaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati.
sn40:2.1.6_1: vitakkavicārānaṁ vūpasamā ajjhattaṁ sampasādanaṁ cetaso ekodibhāvaṁ avitakkaṁ avicāraṁ samādhijaṁ pītisukhaṁ dutiyaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharāmi.
sn40:2.1.7_0: Tassa mayhaṁ, āvuso, iminā vihārena viharato vitakkasahagatā saññāmanasikārā samudācaranti.
sn40:2.2.1_0: Atha kho maṁ, āvuso, bhagavā iddhiyā upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca:
sn40:2.2.4_1: aparena samayena vitakkavicārānaṁ vūpasamā ajjhattaṁ sampasādanaṁ cetaso ekodibhāvaṁ avitakkaṁ avicāraṁ
sn40:2.2.4_2: samādhijaṁ pītisukhaṁ dutiyaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja vihāsiṁ.
sn40:2.2.5_0: Yañhi taṁ, āvuso, sammā vadamāno vadeyya:
sn40:2.2.6_0: ‘satthārānuggahito sāvako mahābhiññataṁ patto’ti, mamaṁ taṁ sammā vadamāno vadeyya:
sn40:3.1.4_0: idha bhikkhu pītiyā ca virāgā upekkhako ca viharati sato ca sampajāno sukhañca kāyena paṭisaṁvedeti,
sn40:3.1.4_2: ‘upekkhako satimā sukhavihārī’ti tatiyaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati.
sn40:3.1.6_1: pītiyā ca virāgā upekkhako ca viharāmi sato ca sampajāno sukhañca kāyena paṭisaṁvedemi.
sn40:3.1.6_3: ‘upekkhako satimā sukhavihārī’ti tatiyaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharāmi.
sn40:3.1.7_0: Tassa mayhaṁ, āvuso, iminā vihārena viharato pītisahagatā saññāmanasikārā samudācaranti.
sn40:3.2.1_0: Atha kho maṁ, āvuso, bhagavā iddhiyā upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca:
sn40:3.2.4_1: aparena samayena pītiyā ca virāgā upekkhako ca viharāmi sato ca sampajāno sukhañca kāyena paṭisaṁvedemi,
sn40:3.2.4_3: ‘upekkhako satimā sukhavihārī’ti tatiyaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja vihāsiṁ.
sn40:3.2.5_0: Yañhi taṁ āvuso sammā vadamāno vadeyya …pe… mahābhiññataṁ patto”ti.
sn40:4.1.4_0: ‘idha bhikkhu sukhassa ca pahānā dukkhassa ca pahānā pubbeva somanassadomanassānaṁ atthaṅgamā adukkhamasukhaṁ
sn40:4.1.6_1: sukhassa ca pahānā dukkhassa ca pahānā pubbeva somanassadomanassānaṁ atthaṅgamā adukkhamasukhaṁ upekkhāsatipārisuddhiṁ
sn40:4.1.7_0: Tassa mayhaṁ, āvuso, iminā vihārena viharato sukhasahagatā saññāmanasikārā samudācaranti.
sn40:4.2.1_0: Atha kho maṁ, āvuso, bhagavā iddhiyā upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca:
sn40:4.2.4_1: aparena samayena sukhassa ca pahānā dukkhassa ca pahānā pubbeva somanassadomanassānaṁ atthaṅgamā adukkhamasukhaṁ
sn40:4.2.5_0: Yañhi taṁ, āvuso, sammā vadamāno vadeyya …pe… mahābhiññataṁ patto”ti.
sn40:5.1.4_0: ‘idha bhikkhu sabbaso rūpasaññānaṁ samatikkamā paṭighasaññānaṁ atthaṅgamā nānattasaññānaṁ amanasikārā
sn40:5.1.6_1: sabbaso rūpasaññānaṁ samatikkamā paṭighasaññānaṁ atthaṅgamā nānattasaññānaṁ amanasikārā ananto ākāsoti ākāsānañcāyatanaṁ upasampajja viharāmi.
sn40:5.1.7_0: Tassa mayhaṁ, āvuso, iminā vihārena viharato rūpasahagatā saññāmanasikārā samudācaranti.
sn40:5.2.1_0: Atha kho maṁ, āvuso, bhagavā iddhiyā upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca:
sn40:5.2.4_1: aparena samayena sabbaso rūpasaññānaṁ samatikkamā paṭighasaññānaṁ atthaṅgamā nānattasaññānaṁ amanasikārā
sn40:5.2.5_0: Yañhi taṁ, āvuso, sammā vadamāno vadeyya …pe… mahābhiññataṁ patto”ti.
sn40:6.1.4_0: ‘idha bhikkhu sabbaso ākāsānañcāyatanaṁ samatikkamma anantaṁ viññāṇanti viññāṇañcāyatanaṁ upasampajja viharati.
sn40:6.1.6_1: sabbaso ākāsānañcāyatanaṁ samatikkamma anantaṁ viññāṇanti viññāṇañcāyatanaṁ upasampajja viharāmi.
sn40:6.1.7_0: Tassa mayhaṁ, āvuso, iminā vihārena viharato ākāsānañcāyatanasahagatā saññāmanasikārā samudācaranti.
sn40:6.2.1_0: Atha kho maṁ, āvuso, bhagavā iddhiyā upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca:
sn40:6.2.4_1: aparena samayena sabbaso ākāsānañcāyatanaṁ samatikkamma anantaṁ viññāṇanti viññāṇañcāyatanaṁ upasampajja vihāsiṁ.
sn40:6.2.5_0: Yañhi taṁ, āvuso, sammā vadamāno vadeyya …pe… mahābhiññataṁ patto”ti.
sn40:7.1.4_0: ‘idha bhikkhu sabbaso viññāṇañcāyatanaṁ samatikkamma natthi kiñcīti ākiñcaññāyatanaṁ upasampajja viharati.
sn40:7.1.6_1: sabbaso viññāṇañcāyatanaṁ samatikkamma natthi kiñcīti ākiñcaññāyatanaṁ upasampajja viharāmi.
sn40:7.1.7_0: Tassa mayhaṁ, āvuso, iminā vihārena viharato viññāṇañcāyatanasahagatā saññāmanasikārā samudācaranti.
sn40:7.2.1_0: Atha kho maṁ, āvuso, bhagavā iddhiyā upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca:
sn40:7.2.4_1: aparena samayena sabbaso viññāṇañcāyatanaṁ samatikkamma natthi kiñcīti ākiñcaññāyatanaṁ upasampajja vihāsiṁ.
sn40:7.2.5_0: Yañhi taṁ, āvuso, sammā vadamāno vadeyya …pe… mahābhiññataṁ patto”ti.
sn40:8.1.4_0: ‘idha bhikkhu sabbaso ākiñcaññāyatanaṁ samatikkamma nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṁ upasampajja viharati.
sn40:8.1.6_1: sabbaso ākiñcaññāyatanaṁ samatikkamma nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṁ upasampajja viharāmi.
sn40:8.1.7_0: Tassa mayhaṁ, āvuso, iminā vihārena viharato ākiñcaññāyatanasahagatā saññāmanasikārā samudācaranti.
sn40:8.2.1_0: Atha kho maṁ, āvuso, bhagavā iddhiyā upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca:
sn40:8.2.4_1: aparena samayena sabbaso ākiñcaññāyatanaṁ samatikkamma nevasaññānāsaññāyatanaṁ upasampajja vihāsiṁ.
sn40:8.2.5_0: Yañhi taṁ, āvuso, sammā vadamāno vadeyya …pe… mahābhiññataṁ patto”ti.
sn40:9.1.4_0: ‘idha bhikkhu sabbanimittānaṁ amanasikārā animittaṁ cetosamādhiṁ upasampajja viharati.
sn40:9.1.6_0: So khvāhaṁ, āvuso, sabbanimittānaṁ amanasikārā animittaṁ cetosamādhiṁ upasampajja viharāmi.
sn40:9.1.7_0: Tassa mayhaṁ, āvuso, iminā vihārena viharato nimittānusāri viññāṇaṁ hoti.
sn40:9.2.1_0: Atha kho maṁ, āvuso, bhagavā iddhiyā upasaṅkamitvā etadavoca:
sn40:9.2.4_1: aparena samayena sabbanimittānaṁ amanasikārā animittaṁ cetosamādhiṁ upasampajja vihāsiṁ.
sn40:9.2.5_0: Yañhi taṁ, āvuso, sammā vadamāno vadeyya:
sn40:9.2.6_0: ‘satthārānuggahito sāvako mahābhiññataṁ patto’ti, mamaṁ taṁ sammā vadamāno vadeyya:
sn40:10.1.1_0: Atha kho āyasmā mahāmoggallāno—seyyathāpi nāma balavā puriso samiñjitaṁ vā bāhaṁ pasāreyya,
sn40:10.1.2_0: Atha kho sakko devānamindo pañcahi devatāsatehi saddhiṁ yenāyasmā mahāmoggallāno tenupasaṅkami;
sn40:10.1.2_1: upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṁ mahāmoggallānaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ aṭṭhāsi.
sn40:10.1.2_2: Ekamantaṁ ṭhitaṁ kho sakkaṁ devānamindaṁ āyasmā mahāmoggallāno etadavoca:
sn40:10.2.2_2: evam’idhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapajjanti.
sn40:10.2.4_2: evam’idhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapajjanti.
sn40:10.2.6_2: evam’idhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapajjantī”ti.
sn40:10.3.2_2: evam’idhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapajjanti.
sn40:10.3.3_0: Sādhu kho, mārisa moggallāna, dhammasaraṇagamanaṁ hoti.
sn40:10.3.4_2: evam’idhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapajjanti.
sn40:10.4.1_0: Atha kho sakko devānamindo chahi devatāsatehi saddhiṁ …pe…
sn40:10.4.2_0: atha kho sakko devānamindo sattahi devatāsatehi saddhiṁ …pe…
sn40:10.4.3_0: atha kho sakko devānamindo aṭṭhahi devatāsatehi saddhiṁ …pe…
sn40:10.4.4_0: atha kho sakko devānamindo asītiyā devatāsahassehi saddhiṁ yenāyasmā mahāmoggallāno tenupasaṅkami;
sn40:10.4.4_1: upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṁ mahāmoggallānaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ aṭṭhāsi.
sn40:10.4.4_2: Ekamantaṁ ṭhitaṁ kho sakkaṁ devānamindaṁ āyasmā mahāmoggallāno etadavoca:
sn40:10.5.2_2: evam’idhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapajjanti.
sn40:10.5.4_2: evam’idhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapajjanti.
sn40:10.5.6_2: evam’idhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapajjantī”ti.
sn40:10.6.2_2: evam’idhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapajjanti.
sn40:10.6.3_0: Sādhu kho, mārisa moggallāna, dhammasaraṇagamanaṁ hoti …pe…
sn40:10.6.4_0: sādhu kho, mārisa moggallāna, saṅghasaraṇagamanaṁ hoti.
sn40:10.6.5_2: evam’idhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapajjantī”ti.
sn40:10.7.1_0: Atha kho sakko devānamindo pañcahi devatāsatehi saddhiṁ yenāyasmā mahāmoggallāno tenupasaṅkami;
sn40:10.7.1_1: upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṁ mahāmoggallānaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ aṭṭhāsi.
sn40:10.7.1_2: Ekamantaṁ ṭhitaṁ kho sakkaṁ devānamindaṁ āyasmā mahāmoggallāno etadavoca:
sn40:10.8.1_0: “Sādhu kho, devānaminda, buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgamanaṁ hoti:
sn40:10.8.2_0: ‘itipi so bhagavā arahaṁ sammāsambuddho vijjācaraṇasampanno sugato lokavidū anuttaro purisadammasārathi satthā devamanussānaṁ buddho bhagavā’ti.
sn40:10.8.3_2: evam’idhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapajjanti.
sn40:10.9.1_0: Sādhu kho, devānaminda, dhamme aveccappasādena samannāgamanaṁ hoti:
sn40:10.9.2_0: ‘svākkhāto bhagavatā dhammo sandiṭṭhiko akāliko ehipassiko opaneyyiko paccattaṁ veditabbo viññūhī’ti.
sn40:10.9.3_2: evam’idhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapajjanti.
sn40:10.10.1_0: Sādhu kho, devānaminda, saṅghe aveccappasādena samannāgamanaṁ hoti:
sn40:10.10.2_4: yadidaṁ cattāri purisayugāni aṭṭha purisapuggalā esa bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho āhuneyyo pāhuneyyo dakkhiṇeyyo
sn40:10.10.3_2: evam’idhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapajjanti.
sn40:10.11.1_2: ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgamanaṁ hoti akhaṇḍehi acchiddehi asabalehi akammāsehi bhujissehi viññuppasatthehi aparāmaṭṭhehi samādhisaṁvattanikehi.
sn40:10.11.2_2: evam’idhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapajjantī”ti.
sn40:10.12.1_0: “Sādhu kho, mārisa moggallāna, buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgamanaṁ hoti:
sn40:10.12.3_2: evam’idhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapajjanti.
sn40:10.13.1_0: Sādhu kho, mārisa moggallāna, dhamme aveccappasādena samannāgamanaṁ hoti:
sn40:10.13.3_2: evam’idhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapajjanti.

sn40:10.14.3_2: evam’idhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapajjanti.
sn40:10.15.2_2: evam’idhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapajjantī”ti.
sn40:10.16.1_0: Atha kho sakko devānamindo chahi devatāsatehi saddhiṁ …pe….

sn40:10.16.3_0: Atha kho sakko devānamindo aṭṭhahi devatāsatehi saddhiṁ …pe….
sn40:10.16.4_0: Atha kho sakko devānamindo asītiyā devatāsahassehi saddhiṁ yenāyasmā mahāmoggallāno tenupasaṅkami;
sn40:10.16.4_1: upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṁ mahāmoggallānaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ aṭṭhāsi.

sn40:10.17.1_0: “Sādhu kho, devānaminda, buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgamanaṁ hoti:
sn40:10.17.2_0: ‘itipi so bhagavā …pe… satthā devamanussānaṁ buddho bhagavā’ti.
sn40:10.17.3_2: evam’idhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapajjanti.

sn40:10.18.3_2: evam’idhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapajjanti.

sn40:10.19.3_2: evam’idhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapajjanti.

sn40:10.21.2_0: ‘itipi so bhagavā …pe… satthā devamanussānaṁ buddho bhagavā’ti.
sn40:10.21.3_2: evam’idhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapajjanti.

sn40:10.22.3_2: evam’idhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapajjanti.

sn40:10.23.3_2: evam’idhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapajjanti.

sn40:10.25.1_0: Atha kho sakko devānamindo pañcahi devatāsatehi saddhiṁ yenāyasmā mahāmoggallāno tenupasaṅkami …pe…
sn40:10.25.2_0: ekamantaṁ ṭhitaṁ kho sakkaṁ devānamindaṁ āyasmā mahāmoggallāno etadavoca:
sn40:10.26.2_2: evam’idhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapajjanti.
sn40:10.26.3_0: Te aññe deve dasahi ṭhānehi adhigaṇhanti—
sn40:10.27.2_2: evam’idhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapajjanti.
sn40:10.27.3_0: Te aññe deve dasahi ṭhānehi adhigaṇhanti—
sn40:10.28.2_2: evam’idhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapajjanti.
sn40:10.28.3_0: Te aññe deve dasahi ṭhānehi adhigaṇhanti—
sn40:10.29.2_2: evam’idhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapajjanti.
sn40:10.29.3_0: Te aññe deve dasahi ṭhānehi adhigaṇhanti—
sn40:10.30.1_0: Sādhu kho, mārisa moggallāna, dhammasaraṇagamanaṁ hoti …pe….
sn40:10.31.1_0: Sādhu kho, mārisa moggallāna, saṅghasaraṇagamanaṁ hoti.
sn40:10.31.2_2: evam’idhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapajjanti.
sn40:10.31.3_0: Te aññe deve dasahi ṭhānehi adhigaṇhanti—
sn40:10.32.1_0: Atha kho sakko devānamindo chahi devatāsatehi saddhiṁ …pe…
sn40:10.32.2_0: atha kho sakko devānamindo sattahi devatāsatehi saddhiṁ …pe…
sn40:10.32.3_0: atha kho sakko devānamindo aṭṭhahi devatāsatehi saddhiṁ …pe…
sn40:10.32.4_0: atha kho sakko devānamindo asītiyā devatāsahassehi saddhiṁ yenāyasmā mahāmoggallāno tenupasaṅkami;
sn40:10.32.4_1: upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṁ mahāmoggallānaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ aṭṭhāsi.
sn40:10.32.4_2: Ekamantaṁ ṭhitaṁ kho sakkaṁ devānamindaṁ āyasmā mahāmoggallāno etadavoca:
sn40:10.33.2_2: evam’idhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapajjanti.
sn40:10.33.3_0: Te aññe deve dasahi ṭhānehi adhigaṇhanti—
sn40:10.35.2_2: evam’idhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapajjanti.
sn40:10.35.3_0: Te aññe deve dasahi ṭhānehi adhigaṇhanti—
sn40:10.36.2_0: sādhu kho, mārisa moggallāna, dhammasaraṇagamanaṁ hoti …pe…
sn40:10.36.3_0: sādhu kho, mārisa moggallāna, saṅghasaraṇagamanaṁ hoti.
sn40:10.36.4_2: evam’idhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapajjanti.
sn40:10.36.5_0: Te aññe deve dasahi ṭhānehi adhigaṇhanti—
sn40:10.37.1_0: Atha kho sakko devānamindo pañcahi devatāsatehi saddhiṁ yenāyasmā mahāmoggallāno tenupasaṅkami;
sn40:10.37.1_1: upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṁ mahāmoggallānaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ aṭṭhāsi.
sn40:10.37.1_2: Ekamantaṁ ṭhitaṁ kho sakkaṁ devānamindaṁ āyasmā mahāmoggallāno etadavoca:
sn40:10.38.1_0: “Sādhu kho, devānaminda, buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgamanaṁ hoti:
sn40:10.38.2_0: ‘itipi so bhagavā …pe… satthā devamanussānaṁ buddho bhagavā’ti.
sn40:10.38.3_2: evam’idhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapajjanti.
sn40:10.38.4_0: Te aññe deve dasahi ṭhānehi adhigaṇhanti—
sn40:10.39.1_0: Sādhu kho, devānaminda, dhamme aveccappasādena samannāgamanaṁ hoti:
sn40:10.39.3_2: evam’idhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapajjanti …pe….
sn40:10.40.1_0: Sādhu kho, devānaminda, saṅghe aveccappasādena samannāgamanaṁ hoti:
sn40:10.40.3_2: evam’idhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapajjanti …pe….
sn40:10.41.2_2: evam’idhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapajjanti.
sn40:10.41.3_0: Te aññe deve dasahi ṭhānehi adhigaṇhanti—
sn40:10.42.1_0: “Sādhu kho, mārisa moggallāna, buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgamanaṁ hoti:
sn40:10.42.2_0: ‘itipi so bhagavā …pe… satthā devamanussānaṁ buddho bhagavā’ti.
sn40:10.42.3_2: evam’idhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapajjanti.
sn40:10.42.4_0: Te aññe deve dasahi ṭhānehi adhigaṇhanti—
sn40:10.43.1_0: Sādhu kho, mārisa moggallāna, dhamme aveccappasādena samannāgamanaṁ hoti:
sn40:10.43.3_2: evam’idhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapajjanti.
sn40:10.43.4_0: Te aññe deve dasahi ṭhānehi adhigaṇhanti—
sn40:10.44.1_0: Sādhu kho, mārisa moggallāna, saṅghe aveccappasādena samannāgamanaṁ hoti:
sn40:10.44.3_2: evam’idhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapajjanti …pe….
sn40:10.45.2_2: evam’idhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapajjanti.
sn40:10.45.3_0: Te aññe deve dasahi ṭhānehi adhigaṇhanti—
sn40:10.46.1_0: Atha kho sakko devānamindo chahi devatāsatehi saddhiṁ …pe…
sn40:10.46.2_0: atha kho sakko devānamindo sattahi devatāsatehi saddhiṁ …pe…
sn40:10.46.3_0: atha kho sakko devānamindo aṭṭhahi devatāsatehi saddhiṁ …pe…
sn40:10.46.4_0: atha kho sakko devānamindo asītiyā devatāsahassehi saddhiṁ yenāyasmā mahāmoggallāno tenupasaṅkami;
sn40:10.46.4_1: upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṁ mahāmoggallānaṁ abhivādetvā ekamantaṁ aṭṭhāsi.
sn40:10.46.4_2: Ekamantaṁ ṭhitaṁ kho sakkaṁ devānamindaṁ āyasmā mahāmoggallāno etadavoca:
sn40:10.47.1_0: “Sādhu kho, devānaminda, buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgamanaṁ hoti:
sn40:10.47.2_0: ‘itipi so bhagavā arahaṁ sammāsambuddho vijjācaraṇasampanno sugato lokavidū anuttaro purisadammasārathi satthā devamanussānaṁ buddho bhagavā’ti.
sn40:10.47.3_2: evam’idhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapajjanti.
sn40:10.47.4_0: Te aññe deve dasahi ṭhānehi adhigaṇhanti—
sn40:10.48.1_0: Sādhu kho, devānaminda, dhamme aveccappasādena samannāgamanaṁ hoti:
sn40:10.48.2_0: ‘svākkhāto bhagavatā dhammo sandiṭṭhiko akāliko ehipassiko opaneyyiko paccattaṁ veditabbo viññūhī’ti.
sn40:10.48.3_2: evam’idhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapajjanti.
sn40:10.48.4_0: Te aññe deve dasahi ṭhānehi adhigaṇhanti—
sn40:10.49.1_0: Sādhu kho, devānaminda, saṅghe aveccappasādena samannāgamanaṁ hoti:
sn40:10.49.2_4: yadidaṁ cattāri purisayugāni aṭṭha purisapuggalā esa bhagavato sāvakasaṅgho āhuneyyo pāhuneyyo dakkhiṇeyyo
sn40:10.49.3_2: evam’idhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapajjanti.
sn40:10.49.4_0: Te aññe deve dasahi ṭhānehi adhigaṇhanti—
sn40:10.50.1_2: ariyakantehi sīlehi samannāgamanaṁ hoti akhaṇḍehi acchiddehi asabalehi akammāsehi bhujissehi viññuppasatthehi aparāmaṭṭhehi samādhisaṁvattanikehi.
sn40:10.50.2_2: evam’idhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapajjanti.
sn40:10.50.3_0: Te aññe deve dasahi ṭhānehi adhigaṇhanti—
sn40:10.51.1_0: “Sādhu kho, mārisa moggallāna, buddhe aveccappasādena samannāgamanaṁ hoti:
sn40:10.51.2_0: ‘itipi so bhagavā …pe… satthā devamanussānaṁ buddho bhagavā’ti.
sn40:10.51.3_2: evam’idhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapajjanti.
sn40:10.51.4_0: Te aññe deve dasahi ṭhānehi adhigaṇhanti—
sn40:10.52.1_0: Sādhu kho, mārisa moggallāna, dhamme aveccappasādena samannāgamanaṁ hoti:
sn40:10.52.3_2: evam’idhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapajjanti.
sn40:10.52.4_0: Te aññe deve dasahi ṭhānehi adhigaṇhanti—
sn40:10.53.1_0: Sādhu kho, mārisa moggallāna, saṅghe aveccappasādena samannāgamanaṁ hoti:
sn40:10.53.3_2: evam’idhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapajjanti.
sn40:10.53.4_0: Te aññe deve dasahi ṭhānehi adhigaṇhanti—
sn40:10.54.2_2: evam’idhekacce sattā kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapajjanti.
sn40:10.54.3_0: Te aññe deve dasahi ṭhānehi adhigaṇhanti—
sn40:11.6.1_0: (Yathā sakkasuttaṁ tathā ime pañca peyyālā vitthāretabbā.)
